tika.dc.description:
With whip-smart prose, reminiscent of Roxane Gay and Meghan Daum, ACTION interweaves Spiegel's own sexual autobiography with loving advice on one-night stands, relationships, and everything in between.
ACTION is a book about boning that people won't feel embarrassed about owning. There are absolutely zero provocatively shaped fruit on the cover, for one. In ACTION, Amy Rose Spiegel exhorts you to trust yourself and be respectful of others—and to have the best possible time doing the things you search for on the Internet, except in reality. The book covers consent, safety, group sex, gender, and the best breakfast to make for a one-night stand. And ACTION totally doesn't think it's weird that you want to try that thing together. In fact, ACTION is very into it.
Spiegel also includes dissections on making threesomes less intimidating-feeling, hitting on people without worrying that you're coming off as a skeezer, celibacy as a display of autonomy, and, of...
